content.rendered: Meet Charlotte Kay, Investor Relations Manager at Millennium in London. The firm’s entrepreneurial culture empowers her to be at the top of her game.

excerpt.rendered: Meet Charlotte Kay, Investor Relations Manager at Millennium in London. The firm’s entrepreneurial culture empowers her to be at the top of her game.
